fri, 14 feb 2025 01:00:00 +0000
fri, 14 feb 2025 01:20:12 +0000
libsyn webengine 2.0
http://www.coasterradio.com
		en
2005-2025 lift hill media, llc
http://www.coasterradio.com
mike@coasterradio.com (mike@coasterradio.com)
a weekly podcast dedicated to theme parks, roller coasters and thrill rides.

during each show, we talk about the total theme park experience.  we'll have interviews with the people making decisions at your favorite park, reviews and ratings of the newest rides and attractions, discussion about everyday park experiences and chances to win tickets and merchandise from parks around the country!

the 20th season begins
fri, 10 jan 2025 01:00:00 +0000

https://traffic.libsyn.com/coasterradio/coasterradio_2001.mp3

<p>this week, mike and e.b. kick off the 20th season of coaster radio! they discuss the new theme song and logo, introduce a nostalgic game show called "soundwave," and share news about a rumored roller coaster coming to six flags magic mountain. they also bid farewell to "rip ride rocket" at universal orlando and "berserker" at kings dominion, reflecting on the nostalgia and memories associated with these attractions. they also hear a review of the new "jungle rush" attraction in australia and celebrate the 20th anniversary of coaster radio with a return of the character "coaster boy," who passionately critiques the current state of roller coasters and the industry. the guys also reflect on the changes in theme parks over the past 20 years, introduce exciting new segments for season 20, and engage with listeners through the mailbag.</p>

https://traffic.libsyn.com/coasterradio/coasterradio_1943.mp3

<p>mike and eb delve into the legacy of kingda ka, the world's tallest and fastest roller coaster, as it faces retirement. they discuss the ride's history, the excitement surrounding its last operational weekend, and the future of six flags great adventure, including the announcement of a new record-breaking coaster set to debut in 2026. the conversation highlights the emotional connection enthusiasts have with kingda ka and speculates on what the future holds for the park and its attractions. in this episode, the hosts discuss the recent announcements for six flags attractions in 2026, reflecting on the unusual timing and lack of details. the conversation shifts to the use of ai technology to enhance old audio segments from their archives, showcasing the evolution of their podcasting journey. they reminisce about their early podcasting days, highlighting the challenges of producing quality audio content in the past. they also feature an classic interview with larry chockola, the chief engineer for kingda ka in 2005, discussing the ride's construction and significance.</p>

<p>on april 25, 2005, a group of guys got together and recorded themselves talking about theme parks and thrill rides. they put it online as a podcast and called it "coaster radio."</p> <p>15 years and 568 episodes later, the show is still here.</p> <p>join us this week (for episode #569) to celebrate the podcast and have some good discussion the parks and rides we all love.</p>

coasterradio.com #1339 - punched in the face at the park

fri, 26 jul 2019 00:00:00 +0000
1c3bf044ea3248bd860fcc12f92c65b6

fri, 21 dec 2018 01:00:00 +0000

https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1312.mp3

<p>this week's first drop takes a look at the new "roller coaster" that will be built on a carnival cruise ship. "the bolt" will run on 800 feet of track at a maximum height of 187 feet above the sea level and a top speed of 40 mph. we'll talk about what type of reception this is likely to get from coaster fans and if this ride even deserves to be called a "coaster."</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about several of this week's most interesting stories in the amusement industry, including:</p> <p> </p> <ul> <li>walt disney world just purchased nearly 1,000 acres for $23 million, but the reason is interesting</li> <li>disneyland paris has announced that two attractions at the walt disney studios paris park will soon close forever</li> <li>the final track piece for copperhead strike was installed last friday afternoon. is that a record?</li> <li>the potter coaster train is on the tracks!</li> </ul> <p> </p> <p>after that, it's time to name the nominees for the best new attraction of 2018!</p> <p>with the help of our listeners, we'll take a look at all of the big new additions from the past year and figure out which one of them is most deserving to be named the best of the best!</p>

<p>we are using this season of the show to determine the greatest roller coaster name of all time. to help us figure out what goes into picking the perfect name, we'll be talking with experts at the parks to hear their stories about how their iconic rides were named.</p> <p>this week, we are joined by brian knoebel, co-owner and manager of knoebels and stacy ososkie, public relations director at knoebels. they will tell us the stories behind the naming of phoenix, flying turns, twister, impulse and more!</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about several of this week's most interesting stories in the amusement industry, including:</p> <p> </p> <ul> <li><a href= "https://www.ocregister.com/2018/12/07/disneyland-is-quietly-revoking-annual-passes-of-guests-who-buy-and-resell-souvenirs/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">disneyland canceling annual passes</a> for people who buy merch and sell it for a profit</li> <li><a href= "https://pittsburgh.cbslocal.com/2018/12/04/hersheypark-long-lost-wallet-found/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">dude gets his wallet back</a> after losing it four years ago at hersheypark</li> <li><a href= "https://www.wcpo.com/money/consumer/dont-waste-your-money/possible-kings-island-giga-coaster-in-new-video" target="_blank" rel="noopener">why is the local news reporting this as a news story?</a></li> <li><a href= "https://www.silive.com/expo/life-and-culture/erry-2018/12/a707c983854458/jaws-ride-shark-finds-new-home.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">jaws shark resurfaces in a staten island, ny chicken restaurant</a></li> </ul> <p> </p> <p>after that, we'll answer some questions in our mail bag. then, we'll do our best to win over a listener who left us a bad review.</p> <p>finally, it's time for a brand new game show!</p>

coasterradio.com #1309 - sick of iaapa
sick of iaapa
fri, 30 nov 2018 01:00:00 +0000
bd69ac5c1d134ce894251b7f6fff606c
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1309.mp3

<p>this week's show kicks off with a look at <a href= "https://gizmodo.com/six-flags-biometric-case-could-turn-one-of-the-toughest-1830656685" target="_blank" rel="noopener">an interesting lawsuit</a> brought against six flags over the use of biometrics in the parks. the mother of a park guest is suing the the amusement chain because she claims six flags took her son's biometric identifiers (thumbprints) without her permission. the result of the lawsuit will affect how biometrics are used in the parks.</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about several of this week's most interesting stories in the amusement industry, including:</p> <p> </p> <ul> <li><a href= "https://www.midwestinfoguide.com/2018/11/riverfront-redevelopment-sdc.html?m=1" target="_blank" rel="noopener">silver dollar city</a> is doing some interesting construction</li> <li>a look at the actual costs of star wars: galaxy's edge</li> <li>lagoon possibly begins work on <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qdzvtczkf8k" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">"primordial"</a></li> <li>intamin has two amazing coasters for europe</li> </ul> <p> </p> <p> </p> <p>after our mailbag segment, we are joined by dwayne from <a href="http://coasteraddict.com/" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">coasteraddict.com</a>. he and his team were at iaapa last week covering the 10 miles of exhibits. he'll tell us what was hot in orlando and what we can expect from the parks in the future!</p>

coasterradio.com #1306 - what's in a name?
what's in a name
fri, 09 nov 2018 01:00:00 +0000
f03bd7d20de44311813bbe3eb3827ade
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1306.mp3

<p>the theme park industry is in a constant state of flux. the change is driven by many things. but this week, our "first drop" focuses on the "experience economy" and how a specific group of tourists choose to visit theme parks and other exotic places because of the "social media" opportunities they provide.</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about several of this week's most interesting stories in the amusement industry, including:</p> <p> </p> <ul> <li><a href= "http://universal.wdwinfo.com/multiple-new-ride-systems-could-make-their-way-into-universal-parks/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">new attraction patents</a> from universal</li> <li>disney's <a href= "https://blooloop.com/news/disney-augmented-reality-costumes/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">augmented reality costumes</a></li> <li>grand texas theme park opened <a href= "https://abc13.com/community-events/get-a-sneak-peek-of-new-caneys-gator-bayou-adventure-park/4598145/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">gator bayou adventure park</a> for a free day</li> </ul> <p> </p> <p> after some show announcements, we open our mailbag! we also find an <a href="https://amzn.to/2src1dh" target="_blank" rel="noopener">a fantastic new desktop roller coaster</a> on amazon.com!</p> <p>finally, we begin our season-long project to determine the greatest roller coaster name of all-time. we start by having the audience give us their nominees for the best names that invoke fear, excitement and nostalgia!</p>
<p>the theme park industry is in a constant state of flux. the change is driven by many things. but this week, our "first drop" focuses on the "experience economy" and how a specific group of tourists choose to visit theme parks and other exotic places because of the "social media" opportunities they provide.</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about several of this week's most interesting stories in the amusement industry, including:</p> <p> </p> <ul> <li><a href= "http://universal.wdwinfo.com/multiple-new-ride-systems-could-make-their-way-into-universal-parks/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">new attraction patents</a> from universal</li> <li>disney's <a href= "https://blooloop.com/news/disney-augmented-reality-costumes/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">augmented reality costumes</a></li> <li>grand texas theme park opened <a href= "https://abc13.com/community-events/get-a-sneak-peek-of-new-caneys-gator-bayou-adventure-park/4598145/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">gator bayou adventure park</a> for a free day</li> </ul> <p> </p> <p> after some show announcements, we open our mailbag! we also find an <a href="https://amzn.to/2src1dh" target="_blank" rel="noopener">a fantastic new desktop roller coaster</a> on amazon.com!</p> <p>finally, we begin our season-long project to determine the greatest roller coaster name of all-time. we start by having the audience give us their nominees for the best names that invoke fear, excitement and nostalgia!</p>

<p>the off-season is here and that means the local parks are closed to most of us (except for you lucky ones in florida and california!) to help combat the "off-season blues," mike and eb have some ideas that will tide you over until the parks open again in march.</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about several of this week's most interesting stories in the amusement industry, including:</p> <p> </p> <ul> <li>what will be inside <a href= "https://wdwnt.com/2018/10/breaking-full-attraction-restaurant-store-lineup-revealed-for-marvel-super-hero-land-at-disneyland-resort/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">"marvel land"</a> at disney california adventure?</li> <li>mickey and minnie’s runaway railroad being built at mickey’s toontown at disneyland</li> <li><a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kve5bxbn36a" target= "_blank" rel="noopener">west coast racers</a> at six flags magic mountain <a href= "https://www.californiacoasterkings.com/six-flags-magic-mountain-update-october-24th-2018/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">has a preview center</a></li> <li><a href= "https://www.dw.com/en/germany-thousands-evacuated-over-theme-park-bomb-threat/a-46060605" target="_blank" rel="noopener">a bomb threat</a> was called in to german theme park because the caller wanted to ruin friend’s day.</li> </ul> <p> </p> <p> after some interesting live trip reports, we open our mailbag! we also find an <a href="https://amzn.to/2q43uae" target="_blank" rel="noopener">interesting blueprint on amazon.com!</a></p> <p>then, we welcome disney imagineer dave minichiello to the show! dave is an executive creative designer with imagineering and has worked with disney for close to 40 years! he has been responsible for many of the attractions we have experienced at epcot, disneyland paris, magic kingdom and the disney cruise line. most recently, he has lead the creative direction for the seven dwarfs mine train and the little mermaid undersea adventure.</p> <p>but this week, dave joins us to talk about his most recent project...<a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1jga_lojhmk" target="_blank" rel="noopener">toy story land</a> at disney's hollywood studios at walt disney world. dave will tell us about the storyline behind the new land and also all about <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=20cmfskysew" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">"slinky dog dash,"</a> the highly themed roller coaster that is the land's headlining attraction!</p>

coasterradio.com #1218 - the lives of millions are at stake
the lives of millions are at stake
fri, 02 feb 2018 01:00:00 +0000
289369cdac27a82bd8847b6ad6c9b0d6
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1218.mp3

<p>this week's show starts off with a sad first drop. we found out that busch gardens williamsburg has permanently closed their "curse of darkastle" ride. the guys talk about why they think this happened and what could be happening in the future.</p> <p>during our quick hits segment, the guys talk about how <a href= "http://www.themeparkinsider.com/flume/201801/5910/" target= "_blank" rel="noopener">mickey mouse might lose his voice</a> at disney world. they also discuss <a href= "https://www.visitkingsisland.com/blog/2018/january/diamondback-roller-coaster-trains-get-new-seats" target="_blank" rel="noopener">new seats on diamondback</a> at kings island, how <a href= "https://www.engadget.com/2018/01/25/atari-asks-for-rollercoaster-tycoon-switch-investments/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">atari wants us to pay</a> for rct on nitendo switch, a <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=myxa0d3uumg" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">cool new ride</a> at tivoli gardens, <a href= "http://screamscape.com/html/canada-s_wonderland.htm" target= "_blank" rel="noopener">a drone video</a> of the new dive coaster at canada's wonderland and <a href= "http://www.madmack.de/2018/01/10/2/" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">a looping go kart track!</a></p> <p>the guys also talk with ann irvine and brian ondrey of <a href="http://irvineondrey.com/" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">irvine-ondrey engineering</a>. they are the people who design the control systems for some of our favorite rides and attractions. we'll talk to them about the process of designing and installing control systems for roller coasters. we'll also hear about some of the fun they have behind the scenes.</p> <p>we'll also have the "state of the union for coasterradio!"</p>

fri, 22 dec 2017 01:00:00 +0000

<p>this week's show starts off with a look at a fantastic new virtual reality experience that puts you right in the middle of your own star wars story. one of our listeners had a chance to <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xbrijdu6gn0&feature=youtu.be" target="_blank" rel="noopener">check it out before it opens to the public.</a></p> <p>our quick hits segment takes a look at four interesting news stories from the amusement industry. this week, we take a look at a <a href= "http://www.foxnews.com/travel/2017/12/12/worlds-largest-snowball-fight-cancelled-because-too-much-snow.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">theme park snowball fight that was cancelled</a>... due to snow. we also talk about <a href= "http://screamscape.com/html/six_flags_fiesta_texas.htm" target= "_blank" rel="noopener">how great the wonder woman coaster</a> at fiesta texas looks, some <a href= "http://www.themeparks-uk.com/legoland-windsor-guide/news/761-new-at-legoland-windsor-in-2018" target="_blank" rel="noopener">new attractions coming to legoland windsor</a> and <a href= "https://www.instagram.com/coasterradio/" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">mike's trip to christmas town</a> at busch gardens williamsburg.</p> <p>we get a chance to interview one of the most popular youtube creators... <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/channel/uccng72njb4kr0ndaiz-ksaq" target= "_blank" rel="noopener">taylor from coaster studios.</a> we'll find out more about this innovative film maker and how he has created one of the most successful park-related channels.</p> <p>then, one of our listeners will step to the microphone and see if he can become a podcast legend as he plays the infamous theme park game show "know your coasterboy!"</p> <p>plus, we have a live trip report from christmas at the wizarding world of harry potter and a chance for you to cast your vote for the <a href="http://poll.coasterradio.co%2c/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">coasterradio.com best new attraction of 2017 award!</a></p>

coasterradio.com #1209 - christmas, looting and iaapa swag
christmas, looting and iaapa swag
fri, 01 dec 2017 01:00:00 +0000
0696accc6d3e6e1fd312e349d982d468
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1209.mp3

<p>now that we're past thanksgiving, it's time to turn our attention to the holidays! <a href= "https://www.usatoday.com/story/travel/experience/america/theme-parks/2017/11/27/holiday-events-add-warm-glow-chilly-theme-parks/889031001/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">many parks have decided to stay open to celebrate.</a> this year, there seem to be more than ever! we'll talk all about it and hear a live trip report from the return of <a href="https://www.visitkingsisland.com/play/winterfest" target="_blank" rel="noopener">winterfest at kings island</a>.</p> <p>our quick hits segment takes a look at four interesting news stories from the amusement industry. this week, we take a look at the newest info about <a href= "https://www.bizjournals.com/orlando/news/2017/11/27/heres-the-latest-happening-with-universals.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">nintendo land at universal orlando</a>. we also run through the <a href= "https://youtu.be/p6-r9wmlmxq" target="_blank" rel="noopener">2018 additions at holiday world</a>. mike get's excited about a <a href= "https://disneyparks.disney.go.com/blog/2017/11/new-disneyland-after-dark-event-series-kicks-off-january-18-with-celebration-of-vintage-disneyland/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">"throwback day"</a> at disneyland and finally, the final pieces of the old <a href= "http://www.cleveland.com/entertainment/index.ssf/2017/11/wildwater_kingdom_abandoned.html" target="_blank" rel="noopener">geuaga lake</a> have been torn down.</p> <p>eb tells us about an unscheduled stop to check out the site of the now shuttered <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kswjfh0mg9a" target="_blank" rel= "noopener">"hard rock park,"</a> and then, the guys welcome two guests who will review the <a href="http://www.iaapa.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">iaapa convention</a> from two different perspectives.</p> <p>dwayne from <a href="http://coasteraddict.com/" target= "_blank" rel="noopener">coasteraddict.com</a> tells us about the show from the fan/media perspective. clint novak from <a href="http://centralparkfunland.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">central park funland</a> tells us about the show from the buyer's perspective.</p>
<p>now that we're past thanksgiving, it's time to turn our attention to the holidays! <a href= "https://www.usatoday.com/story/travel/experience/america/theme-parks/2017/11/27/holiday-events-add-warm-glow-chilly-theme-parks/889031001/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">many parks have decided to stay open to celebrate.</a> this year, there seem to be more than ever! coasterradio.com #1119 - hot or not - live!
hot or not - live!
fri, 17 feb 2017 01:00:00 +0000
f0829ff56ae126f859b951794827a3ec
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1119.mp3

<p>this week's show kicks off with a first drop about the rise and fall of <a href= "https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/entertainment/disney-springs/disney-quest-indoor-interactive-theme-park/" target="new">disneyquest.</a>the interactive indoor theme park that was supposed to open with nationwide locations will be closing its doors in july. why did this concept fail and will we ever see anything like it again?</p> <p>then, mike takes a look at some theme park offers he received in the mail recently and does some "theme park math" with eb to see if the deal is worth it. would you pay $99 for a beer membership? would you pay $555 for season-long access to the front of the line of your favorite rides and attractions?</p> <p>we'll also hear an interview with <a href= "http://www.greatcoasters.com/?p=adamhouse" target="new">adam house</a>, the senior design engineer at great coasters international. kevin and cincinnati jon met up with adam at a local chili establishment to learn about his career and what it's like to design high profile roller coasters for high profile parks.</p> <p>finally, <a href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qnf2mqyowxa" target="new">we poll the audience in real-time</a> as we decide whether certain aspects of the amusement industry are hot or not!</p> <p>thanks for listening to coasterradio.com!</p>

coasterradio.com #1109 - thanks and no thanks
thanks and no thanks
fri, 18 nov 2016 01:00:00 +0000
6fbbf831e1993f62ddd4aea63d28f3bf
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1109.mp3

<p>the annual <a href= "http://www.iaapa.org/expos/iaapa-attractions-expo/home" target= "_blank">iaapa convention</a> is happening in orlando this week. it's the big gathering of people who are buying and selling anything and everything related to the amusement industry. we'll talk with dwayne from <a href="http://coasteraddict.com/" target="_blank">coasteraddict.com</a> about what he's seeing on the show floor and what we might expect at the parks during the next decade.</p> <p>next up, we talk about how walt disney world is beta testing a new program called <a href= "http://www.triplepundit.com/2016/11/gps-tracking-disney-world-causing-employee-angst/" target="_blank">"custodial of tomorrow."</a> this week, janitors in tomorrowland are being tracked with an mobile device and are being told what trashcans in their immediate area need dumping and what areas in the park need cleaning. we'll talk with a janitor who is on-duty to see how it's working.</p> <p>then, we'll hear the opening number from c-pain's new musical!</p> <p>finally, we have this week's interactive converstaion where listeners tell us things they are thankful for and not thankful for at their local parks.</p>

coasterradio.com #1108 - a time for self-reflection
a time for self-reflection
fri, 11 nov 2016 00:30:00 +0000
ddfbe3ab9bb0894668361ed4276ef2b4
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1108.mp3

<p>we start this week's first drop by taking a look at <a href="http://www.orlandosentinel.com/travel/attractions/theme-park-rangers-blog/os-universal-volcano-bay-ride-20161103-story.html" target="_blank">universal orlando's volcano bay waterpark</a> that is under construction. <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=c3ro3byorai" target="_blank">check out this video</a> that shows some of the new attractions and the innovative new taputapu wristband that could be a step above disney's magic band.</p> <p>next up, disney received faa approval to use drones as part of their night-time shows. the first will be premiering at disney springs in a few weeks.  <a href= "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zjnxwe-cdfo" target="_blank">take a look at what they are planning!</a></p> <p>with the shocking election results this week, a former president of the united states calls in with an idea to "unite the country." </p> <p>plus, we have a live trip report from <a href= "http://www.dollywood.com/themepark/festivals/smoky-mountain-christmas" target="_blank">dollywood's christmas event</a> and a fantastic interactive converstaion where listeners tell us about their favorite memories from the 2016 season!</p>

<p>halloween is over. that means the off-season has arrived at parks around the country.</p> <p>we'l start off by taking a look at some news around the industry.</p> <p>there's <a href= "http://screamscape.com/html/islands_of_adventure.htm#dragons" target="_blank">a rumor</a> that islands of adventure at universal orlando might be thinking about removing "dragon challenge." could this really happen?.</p> <p>we also have news about new 2017 attractions at <a href= "https://www.dollywood.com/themepark/yof2017" target= "_blank">dollywood</a> and <a href= "https://www.dutchwonderland.com/newride" target="_blank">dutch wonderland</a>. plus, details on how six flags attendance as down over the important summer season. we speculate on the reasons.</p> <p>plus, we have a live trip report from <a href= "https://www.gilroygardens.org/" target="_blank">gilroy gardens</a> and stories from eb and mike's halloween.</p> <p>as a bonus, we have an on-site interview with the creative director of <a href="http://fieldsoffear.coxfarms.com/" target= "_blank">"fields of fear" at cox farms</a> in centerville, va. he'll give us a behind-the-scenes look at this innovative haunt on a real farm.</p>

coasterradio.com #1104 - live from the knoebels meet-up
live from the knoebels meet-up
fri, 14 oct 2016 00:00:00 +0000
47fa6bec425af71239be8c694c60cb44
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1104.mp3

<p>on saturday, october 8, 2016 coasterradio.com listeners gathered at <a href="http://knoebels.com/" target="_blank">knoebels amusement resort</a> in pennsylvania for the fall listener meet-up!</p> <p>to kick off the festivities, we had a live podcast recording at the knoebels campground with juice, coffee and doughnuts for the entire crowd.</p> <p>the show begins with a first drop detailing internet complaints about how walt disney world charged guests stranded by hurricane matthew <a href= "http://www.onezumiverse.com/2016/10/stranded-at-disney-world-hurricane-matthew-12-99-sad-box-lunches-3-hour-waits-for-food-complete-disorganization/" target="_blank">$12.99 for low-quality boxed dinners</a>. was disney wrong to charge so much? or was it their right to do so?</p> <p>we also get into a discussion with the live audience about the best haunts at regional parks. the crowd gives their recommendations on where you should go.</p> <p>we also get into a discussion about what makes knoebels a unique park. we discuss the rides, the food and the atmosphere.</p> <p>after a q&a session with eb and mike and a live trip report from <a href="http://lakecompounce.com/" target="_blank">lake compounce</a>, we celebrate the wedding of rebecca and michael. mike collins dons a suit to be the officiant!</p> <p>finally, we announce the winners of the coasterradio.com park map pile-up!</p> <p>it's all this week on coasterradio.com!</p>

judge eb - fury 325 vs. millennium force
fri, 07 oct 2016 00:00:00 +0000

<p>halloween is just a few weeks away and we start things up with a bit of a controversy.</p> <p>knott's berry farm has <a href= "http://www.ocregister.com/articles/mental-730351-attraction-halloween.html" target="_blank">closed a temporary halloween attraction</a> due to pressure from mental health advocates. was it a smart move or were they wrong to bow to political correctness?</p> <p>we also talk about the new hbo series <a href= "http://www.hbo.com/westworld" target="_blank">"westworld,"</a> a show set in a futuristic theme park where anything goes. is there a chance we could see a real-life version of this someday?</p> <p>and did you hear that <a href= "http://www.foxnews.com/health/2016/10/03/e-cigarette-explosion-injures-girl-at-orlando-theme-park.html" target="_blank">someone's e-cigarette exploded into a fireball</a> aboard the hogwarts express at universal orlando? we're not so sure the explosion was caused by a guest.</p> <p>we'll also have two live trip reports from <a href= "http://www.halloweenhorrornights.com/orlando/" target= "_blank">halloween horror nights</a> and find out if their r.i.p. (vip) tours are worth the expense.</p> <p>then, it's time to enter the courtroom of "judge eb" as two listeners argue the case of "fury 325 vs. millennium force!" each listener will try to convince "his honor" that their particular favorite coaster is #1!</p> <p>it's all this week on coasterradio.com!</p>

coasterradio.com #1102 - a "stone's" throw from busch gardens
a "stone's" throw from busch gardens
fri, 30 sep 2016 00:00:00 +0000
7151d94e55d197f20bfd04ea6eec9844
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1102.mp3

<p>we start off this week's show with three first drop stories!</p> <p>first up, is news about the new roller coaster coming to sea world san diego in 2017 - <a href= "http://newsplusnotes.blogspot.com/2016/09/new-roller-coaster-wave-breaker-rescue.html" target="_blank">wave breaker: the rescue coaster</a>. then, we get into a debate on what is really happening with mean streak at cedar point. finally, we review a story about a doctor who found that taking a ride on a roller coaster could <a href= "http://www.forbes.com/sites/ericmack/2016/09/26/kidney-stones-science-suggests-heading-to-disney-world/#2c66b315ee2e" target="_blank">cure a person of kidney stones</a>.</p> <p>heck, we'll even do an experiment live on-the-air to see if it's true.</p> <p>then, we'll interview phil raybourn, senior manager of consumer event production at <a href= "https://seaworldparks.com/en/buschgardens-williamsburg/" target= "_blank">busch gardens williamsburg</a>. phil is in charge of <a href= "https://seaworldparks.com/en/buschgardens-williamsburg/howloscream?from=homecollection" target="_blank">howl-o-scream</a>, so we'll talk with him all about it. we'll also find out about their <a href= "https://seaworldparks.com/en/buschgardens-williamsburg/howloscream/experiences/no-escape" target="_blank">new escape rooms</a> and the new haunted house <a href= "https://seaworldparks.com/en/buschgardens-williamsburg/howloscream/haunted-houses/circo-sinistro" target="_blank">circo sinistro!</a></p> <p>we'll also have a live trip report from <a href= "https://www.sixflags.com/magicmountain" target="_blank">six flags magic mountain</a> and an interactive discussion about <a href= "http://goldenticketawards.com/2016-top-50-steel-roller-coasters/" target="_blank">amusement today's top 50 steel roller coaster</a> list.</p> <p>it's all this week on coasterradio.com!</p>

coasterradio.com #1101 - season 11 premiere
season 11 premiere
wed, 21 sep 2016 12:30:00 +0000
36f1f8c1389a8899c363353c0adb0d47
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1101.mp3

<p>coasterradio.com is back and ready for its 11th season!</p> <p>we start off by taking a look at the winners of the <a href= "http://goldenticketawards.com/" target="_blank">2016 golden ticket awards</a>. each year,<a href="http://amusementtoday.com/" target= "_blank">amusement today</a> recognizes the best of amusement parks worldwide. did they get it right? or did they miss the mark?</p> <p>we also take a look at the 2017 attractions announcements for both cedar fair and six flags. do the theme park companies have incredible new rides in store for us? or will 2017 be a year to forget on the midways?</p> <p>we also have news about the coasterradio.com listener meet-up on saturday, october 8th and the results of of 2016 listener survey!</p> <p>it's all this week on the first episode of season 11 of coasterradio.com!</p>

https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1021.mp3

<p>six flags made <strong><a href="https://www.sixflags.com/national/vr/overview">a surprise announcement</a></strong> about how they will be adding virtual reality to nine of their roller coasters across north america. mike and eb will discuss the pros and cons and whether this will be a fad or a longtime hit. (2:10)</p>

<p>to get you ready, we're joined by <strong><a href="http://themeparks.about.com/bio/arthur-levine-8002.htm">arthur levine</a></strong>, the <strong><a href="http://themeparks.about.com/">theme parks expect from about.com</a></strong> to preview 35 different new attractions. part i of this series was last week! part ii is here now!</p>

coasterradio.com #1007 - desperate times call for desperate measures
desperate times call for desperate measures
wed, 11 nov 2015 01:00:00 +0000
aa1627aa994182f22a3b414e3295edbb
https://dts.podtrac.com/redirect.mp3/pscrb.fm/rss/p/traffic.libsyn.com/secure/coasterradio/coasterradio_1007.mp3

<p>this week, we interview <strong><a href="http://www.cbsnews.com/news/owner-of-foreclosed-n-h-liquid-planet-water-park-chains-himself-to-slide-tower/">kevin dumont</a></strong>, the owner of <strong><a href="https://www.liquidplanetwaterpark.com/home.php">liquid planet water park</a></strong> in candia, new hampshire. he has chained himself to the top of one of his waterslides in an attempt to save his business from foreclosure. we have a live interview with him from his camp on top of the slide!</p>
<p> </p>
<p>we discuss the announcement from <strong><a href="http://www.sandiegouniontribune.com/news/2015/nov/09/seaworld-san-diego-phase-out-killer-whale-show/">sea world san diego</a></strong> that they will be phasing out their killer whale shows from their park. does this mean the end of all similar shows across the chain.</p>
<p> </p>

coasterradio.com #911 - christmas at the parks
christmas at the parks
fri, 12 dec 2014 01:00:00 +0000
664534e23b27ce2e874ba933d79c2ab4
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coasterradiocom-911-christmas-at-the-parks

<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times;">on this week's show, are interactive queues breeding grounds of germs and illness? we have an interview with ben corneet, the ceo and founder of <strong><a href="http://www.alterface-projects.com/">alterface</a></strong>.... the company providing all of the interactivity to the new justice league attraction coming to six flags over texas next year. we announce the nominees for the <strong><a href="http://poll.coasterradio.com/">coasterradio.com 2014 best new attraction of the year</a> </strong>eb reviews <span style="font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><a style="line-height: 1; text-decoration: none;" href="http://www.krampus-night.com/">krampus night</a>. </span><span style="vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">mike reviews </span><a style="line-height: 1; text-decoration: none;" href="http://seaworldparks.com/christmastown/"><span style="font-weight: bold; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">christmas town</span></a><span style="vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">at busch gardens williamsburg</span></p>
<div style="font-family: times;">
<p style="margin: 0px;"> </p>
<p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: inherit;"><span style="white-space: pre-wrap;">the guys take a look at holiday</span> events at your local parks, including:</span></p>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
<p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;"><span style="font-family: inherit;"> - <a href="https://www.universalorlando.com/events/holidays/macys-holiday-parade.aspx"><strong>macy's holiday parade, universal studios florida</strong></a></span></span></p>
</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">
<p style="margin: 0px;"><span style="font-family: inherit;">     - <strong><a href="http://www.google.com/url?q=http%3a%2f%2fwww.dollywood.com%2fthemepark%2ffestivals%2fsmoky-mountain-christmas.aspx&sa=d&sntz=1&usg=afqjcnefssjjatfgtt1hegvmkmzqsp9gkq">smoky mountain christmas, dollywood</a></strong><span id="goog_209783912"></span><span id="goog_209783913"></span></span></p>
</div>
<div dir="ltr" style="line-height: 1; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">

<p>on this week's show, we'll talk about a <a href="http://touch.orlandosentinel.com/#section/-1/article/p2p-80814882/"><strong>new way</strong></a> for you to jump to the front of the line at sea world parks.  we'll also discuss how kings island is inviting <a href="http://view.mail.cedarfair.info/?j=fec8127171660178&m=fe94137075650c7f7c&ls=fdf3157170630275711c7277&l=feee1579726d03&s=fe6e13707067057c7514&jb=ff63157771&ju=fe5515787c6601787312&r=0"><strong>certain passholders</strong></a> to get to the front of the line as well. tom from louisville joins us to review <strong><a href="http://www.kentuckykingdom.com/">kentucky kingdom.</a></strong></p>

mike joins a secret disney society
fri, 16 aug 2013 00:00:00 +0000
7d011b927a13db36c00b1080a7220fcd
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-743-mike-joins-a-secret-disney-society

<p>there are only two more shows left in season 7!  so this week, we have a jammed packed episode!</p>
<p></p>
<p>first up, eb and mike are joined by kevin and jonathan, the coaster radio correspondents from ohio.</p>
<p></p>
<p>kings island just unveiled plans for <a href="https://www.visitkingsisland.com/banshee"><b>their new 2014 attraction</b></a>!  it will be named "banshee" and it will be the world's longest inverted roller coaster.</p>
<p></p>
<p>the guys will give you the low-down on all the figures and stats, plus interviews with kings island vp and general manager greg scheid and kings island pr manager don helbig.</p>
<p></p>
<p>after that, mike will tell you about his trip to anaheim, california for the 2013 d23 expo!</p>
<p></p>
<p>there were many things to see there... some amazingly cool and others amazingly strange.</p>
<p></p>
<p>but the best of all was when mike and his wife molly took part in a unqiue treasure hunt called "the optimist."  according to the story, it turns out that walt disney was part of a futuristic society dedicated to the future.  and... he left clues behind at disneyland that would encourage certain people to learn about the society and become potential members.</p>
<p></p>
<p>were mike and molly worthy of walt's secret society?  did they find the clues he left behind?  you'll find out this week!</p>

coasterradio.com #739 - podcast time machine (disneyland 1955)
podcast time machine (disneyland 1955)
fri, 19 jul 2013 00:00:00 +0000
bce8881e36d756b873c28726c00fa734
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-739-podcast-time-machine-disneyland-1955

<p>for this week's show you're gonna have to suspend disbelief... and have a lot of imagination.</p>
<p></p>
<p>in fact, this week's episode is our little tribute to imagination.</p>
<p></p>
<p>it's also a tribute to the grand idea that walt disney had over 60 years ago... an idea that is still flourishing today.</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's episode of coasterradio.com, mike and eb hop in their delorean time machine and head back to july 17, 1955 to watch walt disney deliver his disneyland dedication speech.</p>
<p></p>
<p>before they do that, they "broadcast live" from 2013 in the area in between disneyland and disney california adventure.</p>
<p></p>
<p>they talk about the rumored possibility of "flying turns" at knoebels finally opening in august.  they also talk about some major upgrades coming to the "soarin'" attractions at the disney parks and a really cool new tour at dollywood.</p>
<p></p>
<p>plus, dan the t-shirt guy gets a major scoop while on a tour at busch gardens williamsburg and answers a long-time question.  plus, we have a live trip report from six flags great adventure!</p>
<p></p>
<p>it's all coming up on this very "heavy" episode of coasterradio.com.</p>
<p></p>
<p>"it's cold! dam cold!"</p>
<p></p>

coasterradio.com #736 - live from the beach boardwalk
live from the beach boardwalk
sun, 30 jun 2013 23:00:00 +0000
37f6995549533ed3a60372ba4429afda
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-736-live-from-the-beach-boardwalk

<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">one of the favorite pastimes of summer is a trip to the beach.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">it's the smell of the french fries and popcorn, a ride on the rickety old roller coaster and a walk down the wooden boardwalk that people yearn for during the summer months.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">in fact, many of our favorite theme parks try to recreate the "boardwalk vibe" with rides and attractions that simulate a trip to locations like coney island, the santa monica pier and ocean city, nj.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">the coasterradio.com crew is on vacation this week, but mike collins brought along some recording equipment and produced a show from the skye bar in ocean city, md.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">he's joined by his wife molly, his brother and original cast member greg k. and their brother ryan.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">they spend some time talking about how the beach experience is similar to a trip to the theme park.  they also review several of the roller coasters and a few of the original bill tracy dark rides that ocean city is known for all over the world.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">the gang also talks about some of the best themed mini-golf locations that they visited during the week and why we don't see any major theme parks near beach communities.</p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;"></p>
<p style="margin: 0px; font-family: times; font-size: medium;">plus, we have a live trip report from dollywood and much, much more!</p>

coasterradio.com #734 - summer insanity!
summer insanity!
fri, 14 jun 2013 00:00:00 +0000
93dc9bc125587afc7247997548defa5c
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-734-summer-insanity

<p>as summer 2013 rolls along, there's a lot to get excited about! (and we talk about a lot of it on this week's show!)</p>
<p></p>
<p>for instance, <a href="http://seaworldparks.com/en/buschgardens-tampa"><b>busch gardens tampa</b></a> just unveiled plans for their new 2014 attraction... it's a 335-feet tall drop tower named <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y4ukosogphs"><b>"falcon's fury."</b></a></p>
<p></p>
<p>the new ride will drop riders at 60-mph, but with a new twist.  the riders' seats will pivot 90 degrees so that they are facing straight down! insane!</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also take a look at the new fast-food area themed to the long running animated series <a href="http://www.buzzfeed.com/ryanhatesthis/the-simpsons-theme-park-at-universal-studios-is-the-coolest"><b>"the simpsons"</b></a> that just opened at universal studios florida.  will it be worth the price of admission to visit moe's tavern to have a pint of duff beer?</p>
<p></p>
<p>we also have live trip reports from the newly refurbished <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jbkdsyniqic"><b>timber mountain log ride</b></a> at <a href="https://www.knotts.com/"><b>knotts berry farm</b></a> and the crazy new roller coaster at <a href="http://www.altontowers.com/"><b>alton towers</b></a>,<b> <a href="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rlip9t7kuh0">"the smiler."</a></b>  the english ride has 14-inversions! insane!</p>
<p></p>
<p>finally, we talk with steve vandis from indigo films.  he's the co-executive producer for the popular travel channel show <a href="http://www.travelchannel.com/interests/family/articles/insane-coaster-wars-goes-international"><b>"insane coaster wars: world domination."</b></a></p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll talk to him about what we can expect during this season of the show and what it's like to shoot a complicated tv program in some of the world's best known parks.</p>

coasterradio.com #732 - school's out for the summer!
school's out for the summer!
fri, 31 may 2013 00:00:00 +0000
811a515ab9032b243ceadc451504c3b6
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-732-school-s-out-for-the-summer

<p>this year, theme park fans are feverishly anticipating not one, not two, but three wooden coasters with inversions.</p>
<p></p>
<p>the first, <a href="http://silverdollarcity2013.com/"><b>outlaw run at silver dollar city</b></a> opened to much fanfare and success.</p>
<p></p>
<p>now, we hear about the 2nd inverting wooden coaster to open... <a href="http://content.sixflags.com/newfor2013/fiestatexas/iron-rattler/"><b>iron rattler at six flags fiesta texas.</b></a></p>
<p></p>
<p>we're joined by <a href="http://themeparks.about.com/"><b>arthur levine, the theme parks guide at about.com</b></a>, who had a chance to ride the coaster on its opening weekend.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll discuss the ride's unique features, it's amazing setting and whether or not this should really count as a wooden coaster.  oh yeah, arthur will also tell us if the ride is actually worth riding!</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also hear three live trip reports from different parks around the country.  we'll hear reviews of the new <a href="http://seaworldparks.com/seaworld-orlando/antarctica"><b>"antarctica: empire of the penguin" at sea world orlando</b></a>.  we'll also hear reviews of <a href="http://www.funspotattractions.com/amusement-parks/fun-spot-america-orlando/things-to-do/roller-coasters/"><b>"white lightning" and "freedom flyer" at fun spot in orlando</b></a>.</p>
<p></p>
<p>finally, we'll go live to layer elementary school in central florida to talk with the winners of their coaster design contest!  their teacher happens to be a fan of coasterradio.com and asked eb and mike to judge a contest where the kids learned about the physics and technology behind ride design.</p>
<p></p>
<p>who knows, we might be talking to the next generation of disney imagineers!</p>
<p></p>
<p>check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/bcddni"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>
<p>this year, theme park fans are feverishly anticipating not one, not two, but three wooden coasters with inversions.</p>
<p></p>
<p>the first, <a href="http://silverdollarcity2013.com/"><b>outlaw run at silver dollar city</b></a> opened to much fanfare and success.</p>
<p></p>
<p>now, we hear about the 2nd inverting wooden coaster to open... <a href="http://content.sixflags.com/newfor2013/fiestatexas/iron-rattler/"><b>iron rattler at six flags fiesta texas.</b></a></p>
<p></p>
<p>we're joined by <a href="http://themeparks.about.com/"><b>arthur levine, the theme parks guide at about.com</b></a>, who had a chance to ride the coaster on its opening weekend.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll discuss the ride's unique features, it's amazing setting and whether or not this should really count as a wooden coaster.  oh yeah, arthur will also tell us if the ride is actually worth riding!</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also hear three live trip reports from different parks around the country.  we'll hear reviews of the new <a href="http://seaworldparks.com/seaworld-orlando/antarctica"><b>"antarctica: empire of the penguin" at sea world orlando</b></a>.  we'll also hear reviews of <a href="http://www.funspotattractions.com/amusement-parks/fun-spot-america-orlando/things-to-do/roller-coasters/"><b>"white lightning" and "freedom flyer" at fun spot in orlando</b></a>.</p>
<p></p>
<p>finally, we'll go live to layer elementary school in central florida to talk with the winners of their coaster design contest!  their teacher happens to be a fan of coasterradio.com and asked eb and mike to judge a contest where the kids learned about the physics and technology behind ride design.</p>
<p></p>
<p>who knows, we might be talking to the next generation of disney imagineers!</p>
<p></p>

coasterradio.com #731 - eb vs. the blue flash!

fri, 24 may 2013 00:00:00 +0000

https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-731-eb-vs-the-blue-flash

<p>our own eb picked up his family and moved to indiana a few years ago.</p>
<p></p>
<p>since then, he's been enjoying midwestern life... even getting to holiday world as often as he can.</p>
<p></p>
<p>this past week though, he lived out every "coaster boy's" dream.</p>
<p></p>
<p>he rode john iver's legendary backyard looping coaster "the blue flash."</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's episode, eb gives an element-by-element description of the ride and what it was like to see this legend in person.</p>
<p></p>
<p>the guys also take-on the recent news story in the <a href="http://www.nypost.com/p/news/local/manhattan/disney_world_srich_kid_outrage_ztba0xrvzrkivc1zitxgdp"><b>new york post</b></a> about the rich, socialite mothers who have allegedly been hiring disabled tour guides so that the whole family can skip the lines at walt disney world.  eb and mike have a good debate about the story and all its various angles.</p>

coasterradio.com #730 - theme park royalty
theme park royalty
fri, 17 may 2013 00:00:00 +0000
d8e87562354899623d54dabd08315846
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-730-theme-park-royalty

<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">when we've had celebrities on this program before, they've talked about how they have to hire park-provided guides to walk them around to the various attractions and rides.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">if they didn't have this preferential treatment, people would constantly be hounding them for autographs and they wouldn't be able to have any semblance of a "normal" theme park experience.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">but i bet most people don't know that this same exact treatment is available to everyone.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">you can have a private, park-provided guide take you around and get you to the front of even the most crowded lines.  but you have to be willing to pony up the big bucks.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">on this week's show, we'll talk about the different vip programs offered at many of the parks across the country.  we'll talk about what perks you'll get and most importantly, how much it will cost you.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">we'll also talk about one of the newest rumors to come out of the six flags chain.  apparently, a survey is going around asking people what types of new rides they'd like to see at six flags great adventure.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">we'll go through some of the choices and debate the pros and cons of each.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">plus, we have a live trip report and the return of our one-of-a-kind game show - theme park smarts! you'll have a chance to play along with our lucky contestant!</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>

coasterradio.com #728 - the best and worst of animal kingdom
the best and worst of animal kingdom
fri, 03 may 2013 00:00:00 +0000
11872b9e86605fb5b361632078a2bfac
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-728-the-best-and-worst-of-animal-kingdom

<p>this week, disney's animal kingdom celebrated its 15th anniversary.</p>
<p></p>
<p>it's fair to say that of all the disney theme parks, animal kingdom has the greatest divide between people who like and dislike it.</p>
<p></p>
<p>some people claim it's the best designed, most well-themed park in the disney chain.  others feel that it's a complete miss and not worth spending one of their precious vacation days there.</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's show, the coasterradio.com audience steps forward to tell us about their favorite and least favorite aspects to the controversial park.  you'll be surprised at some of the responses.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also talk about <a href="https://www.facebook.com/photo.php?fbid=10151618409980539&set=a.160886830538.152877.73769440538&type=1&theater"><b>the strange new signs</b></a> appearing around the former "son of beast" area at kings island.  the signs warns that they've had to shut down a section of park because of "mysterious, bone chilling screams" and an "evil phenomenon."</p>
<p></p>
<p>of course, the park is gearing up to promote their 2014 attraction.  but what could it be and is the park making the most of this "paranormal pr?"</p>
<p></p>
<p>we also have the inside scoop on a brand new "theme park related" television pilot, a live trip report from the opening day at knoebels and a whole lot more!</p>
<p> </p>
<p>check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/siu9nr"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>

coasterradio.com #727 - the future is now! mystic manor and more!
the future is now! mystic manor and more!
fri, 26 apr 2013 00:00:00 +0000
d7e5729f0b42b54a3cd9a6214f8f44e7
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-727-the-future-is-now-mystic-manor-and-more

<p>every now and then, a theme park attraction comes along that makes you remember why you liked this stuff in the first place.</p>
<p></p>
<p>and sometimes that same ride is so ahead of its time, you realize you've sort-of seen a glimpse into the future of the amusement industry.</p>
<p></p>
<p>this week saw the unveiling of <a href="http://www.insidethemagic.net/2013/04/video-ride-through-mystic-manor-at-hong-kong-disneyland-taking-the-haunted-mansion-in-a-totally-new-high-tech-direction/"><b>"mystic manor" at hong kong disneyland</b></a>.  and for the most part, every disney fan is in agreement that it is one of the finest attractions ever created by imagineering.</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's show, we'll discuss the new attraction, what makes it special and why there are no <i>(at least announced)</i> plans to bring a copy of it to the us parks.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also talk with steve fielding, the president of pantera entertainment about his highly-anticipated new game <a href="http://www.themeparkstudio.com/"><b>"theme park studio."</b></a></p>
<p></p>
<p>the new title will allow players to create their own steel coasters, wooden coasters, dark rides and flat rides with a level of authenticity and realism never before seen in a theme park simulator.</p>
<p></p>
<p>steve will tell us about some new surprises we can expect to see and how listeners can be a part of the development process!</p>
<p></p>
<p>plus, we'll have live trip reports from busch gardens tampa, disney california adventure and silver dollar city.... plus a whole lot more!</p>
<p></p>
<p>check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/c4niet"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>

coasterradio.com #726 - legoland, las vegas and david copperfield
legoland, las vegas and david copperfield
fri, 19 apr 2013 00:00:00 +0000
1091e23a2832483c8a2c7144b9673d83
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-726-legoland-las-vegas-and-david-copperfield

<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">this is one of those shows where a lot is covered in 57 minutes.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">i hope you're ready....</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">first up, the guys talk about the new <b><a href="http://www.slashfilm.com/film-visits-stark-industries-iron-man-tech-exhibit-at-disneyland/">"iron man tech: presented by stark industries"</a></b> exhibit that opened at disneyland.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">besides <b><a href="http://blog.coasterradio.com/2012/02/reel-design-semi-finalist-1-stark-expo.html">sounding a lot like one of last year's "reel design" finalists</a></b>, could this be the first wave of marvel-themed attractions in the disney parks?  the guys will talk about the speculation and what we might see in the next few years.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">the guys also take a look at the progress on <b><a href="http://detroit.cbslocal.com/2013/04/11/cedar-points-new-roller-coaster-gatekeeper-undergoes-testing/">"gatekeeper" at cedar point</a></b>.  the park is already testing their massive winged coaster with almost a month to go before opening day.  you'll hear from one of the park's engineers about what they are doing to get ready for may 11th.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">we'll also hear a live trip report from tom who had lunch with a disney imagineer <b><a href="https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/dining/boardwalk/dine-with-an-imagineer/">as part of a new program offered by the disney parks</a></b>.  did he learn any secret info and will he spill the beans for the coasterradio.com audience?</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">travis from california joins the show to talk about his visit to the grand opening of the <b><a href="http://california.legoland.com/legoland-hotel/">legoland hotel </a></b>in southern california.  travis will give us the inside scoop about what surprises we can expect to see inside the hotel... including an elevator that doubles as a disco!  plus, he'll let us know about some of the things at legoland that even an adult would love.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">finally, the guys go "off topic!" eb gives the audience an update on a major home renovation project and mike fills you in on his "magical" trip to las vegas!  highlights include a "secret" elevator to the top of the stratosphere tower, a ride on the "big shot," a front row seat to david copperfield's show, david making one of mike's friends disappear and a road trip to the grand canyon.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">there's lots of fun and a few surprises on this all new episode of "the original theme park podcast!"</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/t0j94o"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">this is one of those shows where a lot is covered in 57 minutes.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">i hope you're ready....</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">first up, the guys talk about the new <b><a href="http://www.slashfilm.com/film-visits-stark-industries-iron-man-tech-exhibit-at-disneyland/">"iron man tech: presented by stark industries"</a></b> exhibit that opened at disneyland.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">besides <b><a href="http://blog.coasterradio.com/2012/02/reel-design-semi-finalist-1-stark-expo.html">sounding a lot like one of last year's "reel design" finalists</a></b>, could this be the first wave of marvel-themed attractions in the disney parks?  the guys will talk about the speculation and what we might see in the next few years.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">the guys also take a look at the progress on <b><a href="http://detroit.cbslocal.com/2013/04/11/cedar-points-new-roller-coaster-gatekeeper-undergoes-testing/">"gatekeeper" at cedar point</a></b>.  the park is already testing their massive winged coaster with almost a month to go before opening day.  you'll hear from one of the park's engineers about what they are doing to get ready for may 11th.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">we'll also hear a live trip report from tom who had lunch with a disney imagineer <b><a href="https://disneyworld.disney.go.com/dining/boardwalk/dine-with-an-imagineer/">as part of a new program offered by the disney parks</a></b>.  did he learn any secret info and will he spill the beans for the coasterradio.com audience?</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">travis from california joins the show to talk about his visit to the grand opening of the <b><a href="http://california.legoland.com/legoland-hotel/">legoland hotel </a></b>in southern california.  travis will give us the inside scoop about what surprises we can expect to see inside the hotel... including an elevator that doubles as a disco!  plus, he'll let us know about some of the things at legoland that even an adult would love.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">finally, the guys go "off topic!" eb gives the audience an update on a major home renovation project and mike fills you in on his "magical" trip to las vegas!  highlights include a "secret" elevator to the top of the stratosphere tower, a ride on the "big shot," a front row seat to david copperfield's show, david making one of mike's friends disappear and a road trip to the grand canyon.</p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;"></p>
<p style="font-family: times; font-size: medium; margin: 0px;">there's lots of fun and a few surprises on this all new episode of "the original theme park podcast!"</p>

coasterradio.com #724 - disney for the "thinking fan"
disney for the "thinking fan"
fri, 29 mar 2013 00:00:00 +0000
c1202bcd577b060c2655a822b0aee400
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-724-disney-for-the-thinking-fan

<p>anyone who considers themselves a fan of theme parks probably has spent a lot of time analyzing them.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we marvel at how attraction designers use technology to bring the our favorite stories and characters to life.</p>
<p></p>
<p>but, fans can also take the analysis a step further and take a look at the parks from a literary and social angle as well.</p>
<p></p>
<p>for instance, what does "it's a small world" have to do with the civil rights movement of the 1960's?</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's show, we welcome the author of "<a href="http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/1937011240/ref=as_li_ss_tl?ie=utf8&camp=1789&creative=390957&creativeasin=1937011240&linkcode=as2&tag=coasterrcom-20"><b>the thinking fan's guide to walt disney world: magic kingdom</b></a>," aaron wallace.</p>
<p></p>
<p>while most travel guidebooks are aimed at first-timers, aaron's book is aimed someone looking to find  information beyond wait times and ride ratings.</p>
<p></p>
<p>aaron takes a scholarly look at each attraction in the magic kingdom and the stories behind them.  on this week's show, he'll share some of what you'll find in his new book.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we also have two live trip reports this week.... one from the opening day of <a href="http://www.sixflags.com/greatadventure/index.aspx"><b>six flags great adventure</b></a> and one from the opening day of <a href="http://www.lunaparknyc.com/"><b>luna park</b></a> on coney island.  both of these reports have an authentic "jersey" feel to them!</p>
<p></p>
<p>plus, mike just got back from a unique trip to walt disney world where he got to explore new fantasyland and try out the upgraded test track at epcot.  plus, he has some stories about chaperoning 30 high school students who were set loose on the walt disney world resort.</p>
<p></p>
<p>all this, plus a whole lot more on this all-new episode of the original theme park podcast!</p>

coasterradio.com #723 - wild rides, wild animals
wild rides, wild animals
thu, 21 mar 2013 23:00:00 +0000
d44b8ce8fd23e7a4ba4527b152a7760c
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-723-wild-rides-wild-animals

<p><i><b>"outlaw run,"</b></i> one of the most highly anticipated roller coasters of 2013 opened this week at <a href="http://www.silverdollarcity.com/"><b>silver dollar city</b></a> in branson, mo.</p>
<p></p>
<p>the new creation from rocky mountain construction has set a world record for the steepest drop on a wooden coaster at 81 degrees.</p>
<p></p>
<p>it's also the 2nd fastest wooden coaster in the world at 68 mph.</p>
<p></p>
<p>plus, it has the signature element of a <i><b>double barrel roll</b></i> that brings the train back into the station.</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's show, we talk with <a href="http://wgntv.com/bio/marcus-leshock/"><b>marcus leshock</b></a>, a reporter from wgn-tv in chicago.</p>
<p></p>
<p>marcus made the 8-hour drive from the windy city to branson so he could be one of the first people to ride the coaster.</p>
<p></p>
<p>he'll tell us if the hype is for real and if this new attraction will be a hit in 2013.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also talk with kristin <span class="st">siebeneicher, the communications manager at <a href="http://www.sixflags.com/greatadventure/index.aspx"><b>six flags great adventure </b></a>in jackson, nj.</span></p>
<p><span class="st"><br /></span> <span class="st">kristin will tell us about preparations for their opening day this weekend and details of their new <a href="http://content.sixflags.com/newfor2013/greatadventure/safari-off-road-adventure/"><b>"safari off road adventure"</b></a> that is scheduled to open on memorial day.</span></p>
<p></p>
<p><span class="st">the combination of the theme park and the land for the new safari attraction makes six flags great adventure the largest theme park in the world! so, there's a lot to be excited about.</span></p>
<p></p>

coasterradio.com #722 - what ride would make a good tv show?
what ride would make a good tv show?
fri, 15 mar 2013 00:00:00 +0000
f798ee5668f4feb5801b0f49f27ce231
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-722-what-ride-would-make-a-good-tv-show

<p>here at the show, we're curious to find out what what the new <a href="http://www.hollywoodreporter.com/live-feed/abc-orders-big-thunder-mountain-416634"><b>abc television pilot "big thunder"</b></a> is all about.</p>
<p></p>
<p>in the past, there have been movies based on classic theme park attractions (pirates of the carribbean and the haunted mansion), but to our knowledge, this is the first television show based upon a theme park ride.</p>
<p></p>
<p>so while we wait for the show to premiere, we came up with a fun contest idea.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we asked listeners to pick any theme park attraction in the world and turn it into a television pilot of their own.</p>
<p></p>
<p>not surprisingly, the audience delivered some excellent and creative ideas! wait until you hear them!</p>
<p></p>
<p>mike and eb also get into a good "first drop" segment where they discuss the decline of the classic dark ride.</p>
<p></p>
<p>this year, only six dark rides are being built across the world and the majority are being constructed by disney and universal.  what happened to the dark ride and why aren't regional parks like six flags and cedar fair dedicating some capital to building new ones?</p>
<p></p>
<p>we also have a live trip report from six flags great adventure and a live correspondent from a new attraction at the magic kingdom!</p>
<p></p>
<p>check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/hgstgi"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>

coasterradio.com #720 - the man with our "dream job"
the man with our "dream job"
fri, 01 mar 2013 01:35:43 +0000
158fcfb5c3dcc00afadd316d30f98a66
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-720-the-man-with-our-dream-job

<p>if we asked you guys what your "dream job" would be, we're guessing a lot of you would have the same answer...</p>
<p></p>
<p>"disney imagineer."</p>
<p></p>
<p>unfortunately, only a select few get to have that title.  so, it's understandable when some of the more famous names become the "rock stars" of the disney and theme park fan communities.</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's show, we pay tribute to tony baxter, a long-time disney imagineer who recently announced his retirement.</p>
<p></p>
<p>tony is responsible for many disney attractions that have become household names.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll discuss his career and what it means to be an imagineer in 2013 versus 1955. plus, we'll hear from listeners about their favorite tony baxter rides.</p>

<p>we'll also hear plans for a new theme park in texas, news about skyrush at hersheypark and details about changes to the fastpass system at disneyland.</p>

coasterradio.com #719 - gold striker upgraded!
gold striker upgraded!
thu, 21 feb 2013 03:34:56 +0000
52a39ef6b9443fc2895322f8c3ff7656
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-719-gold-striker-upgraded

<p>there's big news this week out of northern california this week and we have the first interviews about it.</p>
<p></p>
<p>california's great america announced that their new roller coaster "gold striker" will now include the world’s longest covered initial descent tunnel on a wooden coaster. </p>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2891" style="text-align: justify;">
<p> </p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p>adding intrigue to the record setting feature, gold striker’s 174-foot tunnel will be enclosed by wood on both sides, corrugated metal on top and in-fill underneath the tracks, to replicate a true "gold mine" feel.</p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p></p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p>we'll talk with tyler currie, director of park operations for california's great america about the new ride and their big announcement.</p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p></p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p>we'll also discuss some rumors coming out of walt disney world in orlando.  word is leaking out about a possible re-imagining of the entire downtown disney complex.... complete with a new name, layout and a five-level parking garage.  interesting stuff... but maybe mike and eb have a better idea of what can be done with the area.</p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p></p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p>all this, plus a live trip report from kings island, the return of "off topic" and a visit from everyone's favorite dutch performance artist!</p>
</div>
<div class="yiv145151047msonormal" id="yui_3_7_2_1_1361417100780_2913" style="text-align: justify;">
<p></p>
</div>

coasterradio.com #718 - listener questions: part i
listener questions: part i
fri, 08 feb 2013 01:00:00 +0000
1f47c1eb1bb3c3cc42b9f0ff11331d18
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-718-listener-question-show-part-i

<p>the best thing about this show are the people who listen to it.</p>
<p></p>
<p>they are all fun, passionate people who share a love of theme parks.</p>
<p></p>
<p>they are also one of the most engaged audiences out there.  when we have asked for listener interaction in the past, we always receive interesting and energetic responses.</p>
<p></p>
<p>that's why we love our yearly "listener question shows."</p>
<p></p>
<p>we received a ton of great questions this week.  actually, we received so many from you guys... we're breaking this show into two parts!</p>
<p></p>
<p>this week, we'll answer questions like:</p>
<p></p>
<p>* if you guys were still bachelors and had your pick of the girls of any of the countries in world showcase who would you choose?  (extra degree of difficulty:  no norway.)</p>
<p></p>
<p>* if you guys could punch one person in the theme park industry who would it be and why?</p>
<p></p>
<p>* what was the most embarrasing thing to happen to you in high school?</p>
<p></p>
<p>* was the disney podcast guy character based on anyone specifically?  and if so, who?</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll also spend our "first drop" segment discussing the best attractions created during the career of disney imagineer tony baxter.  he announced his retirement last week, so we'll spend some time talking about his legacy and his classic disney rides.</p>
<p></p>
<p>plus, we'll have a live trip report from disney's animal kingdom and the return of the greatest amusement industry game show ever: theme park smarts!!!</p>

<p>check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/ecddhi"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>

coasterradio.com #717 - pimp my park: disney edition
pimp my park: disney edition
fri, 01 feb 2013 01:00:00 +0000
0e46e16c38f8cd9f80f6197c1fcf3ec7
https://sites.libsyn.com/21641/coaster-radio-com-717-pimp-my-park-disney-edition

<p>week after week, we get a lot of interesting feedback from you guys.</p>
<p></p>
<p>one listener will write in and say that we need to focus on the regional parks more and less on what's happening at disney.</p>
<p></p>
<p>an hour later, we'll get an e-mail from someone wanting more talk about the disney parks and less about six flags and cedar fair.</p>
<p></p>
<p>it's impossible to come up with topics that please everyone, but this week we might have one that comes close.</p>
<p></p>
<p>on this week's show, mike and eb will take a look at things that the regional theme parks can "copy" or "outright steal" from disney to make the guest experience better for everyone.</p>
<p></p>
<p>the audience steps in with their ideas, as we discuss ways our local parks can improve the family experience.</p>
<p></p>
<p>we'll talk about ride capacity, front-of-the-line programs, food quality, attraction diversity and a bunch of other ideas that might make a trip to six flags a little more like a trip to disneyland.</p>
<p></p>
<p>plus, we'll have a live trip report from verbolten at busch gardens williamsburg and the return of "off-topic!"</p>
<p></p>
<p>check out all of the show notes and links in our new interactive zeen - <a data-blogger-escaped-target="_blank" href="http://zeen.com/read/ljotz3"><b>"in styleee!"</b></a> it's brand new for season seven!</p>
